from wikipedia the free encyclopedia jump to navigation search historic saros cycle animation december 22 1870 series member 53 january 1 1889 series member 54 march 9 1997 chita russia series member 60 saros cycle 120 repeating every 18 years 11 days containing 71 events the series started with a partial solar eclipse on may 27 933 ad and transitioned into an annular eclipse on august 11 1059 it was a hybrid event for 3 dates may 8 1510 through may 29 1546 and are total eclipses from june 8 1564 through march 30 2033 the series ends at member 71 as a partial eclipse on july 7 2195 the longest duration of totality was 2 minutes 50 seconds on march 9 1997 saros member date time greatest utc type location lat long gamma mag width km duration min sec ref 120 1 may 27 933 4 10 41 partial 67.7s
